name: Bad Legged Billy
description:
What is the game about?

Billy can't move anymore, use the recoil from his gun to guide him across the randomly generated terrain. Kill enemies to get points and pick up ammo to stay alive.

Controls

Mouse only - left click to shoot

Story behind the development

I decided to take my game development hobby a little bit more serious and enrolled for Howest Digital arts and entertainment. This is a small game I made in my first semester of DAE. I'm pretty happy with how the project turned out.
